nayomi mishel kolman lankawata aawe me rate kalabalayak athi kirimata noweya.aya pamini thunwana awasthawa meyayi.ehidi apa therum gatha yuththe me ratata saha janathawata aa thula almak pawathina bawayi.me alma rate aarthika punarudayata wadagath ekak wana athara namuth guwan thotulaghe siti olamottalayan ge saha ee gonnatama ada damana polisiyath in anathuruwa aya adhikaranayata giya wita nithiya saha nithignyayanda kriya karanne pera kaleka wariga sabhawaka paridiya.ehi diyunu lokaya ha sasadena kisiwak nathi bawa pahadiliya.athishayinma grothrikawadi hasirimak wana ehi prathipalaya lankawe manawa himikam pilibada salakima thuttuwata wati thibena bawa heli wimaya.

dara kadanna kaleta giya wiwahaka kanthawak (35) dushanaya kirime waradakaru wu pudgalayakuta (42) barapathala wada athiwa awurudu 10ka sira danduwamak niyama kala migamuwa mahadhikarana winisuru shiran gunarathna mahatha ohuta rupiyal 15000ka dadayakda niyama keleya.migamuwa kadirane dawatagahawaththa uthura padinchi pudgalayekta mese danduwam niyama wiya.1995 agosthu masa 20weni dina ho eeta aasanna dinakadi me adhikarana kalapayata ayath katuwakaledi wiwahaka kathak dushanaya karana ladayi chodana kara nithipathiwaraya wisin withthikaruta erehiwa nadu pawara thibuni.nadu wibhagaya awasanayedi withthikaru chodanawata waradakaru wiya.withthikaru saha kanthawa wiwahakayan bawath siddhiya wu dina athawarayata path kanthawa dara kadanna kaleta giya wita withthikaru aya dushanaya kara athi bawath nadu wibhagayedi anawaranaya wiya..

prajathanthrawadaya thula rajyayak sathu balaya wyawasthadayaka, widhayaka saha adhikarana washayen thriwidhakara wana bawath, me aayathana thrithwaya ekinekin swadhina wa ha wen wenwa pawathiya yuthu bawatath wana deshapalana widyawe mulika padama pawa tramp nodanna seyaki.
lari piti mutti wage barayi.
mema siddhiyata mulika hethuwa wi thibune jangama durakathanayaki.
